QuestData.Title: Gray Worg Hides
QuestData.Description: Let me tell you something, mon. When you get put in charge of outfittin' the armies of the Horde, you go through a lot of hides!$B$BConqueror Krenna, the she-wolf runnin' this place, she gave me a tight deadline. If I don't outfit her whole regiment by week's end she's gonna have me wrestling bears in the pit.$B$BHelp me out and I'll pay you top price. I'll be needin' hides from graymist hunters.$B$BYou'll find them all around in pockets to the north, hunting stag. Remember, mon. Top price!
QuestData.LogDescription: Hidetrader Jun'ik in Conquest Hold wants you to get 3 Gray Worg Hides from Graymist Hunters in the woods to the north.
QuestData.RewardText: You're a life saver, $g brother:sistah;. If you're interested in more work, there's more where that came from.
